aboutSection.hero-description: We are a leading technology company in Saudi Arabia and the Middle East, providing innovative solutions that drive business success and digital transformation.
aboutSection.story-title: A Journey of Innovation and Excellence
aboutSection.story-description: Since our founding, we have been committed to delivering cutting-edge technology solutions that help businesses thrive in the digital age. Our team of experts combines creativity with technical expertise to create solutions that make a difference.
aboutSection.highlight1: Trusted by 500+ businesses across the region
aboutSection.values-section-desc: We are guided by our commitment to excellence, innovation, and delivering value to our clients.
aboutSection.mission-desc: To empower businesses with innovative technology solutions that drive growth, efficiency, and success in the digital era.
aboutSection.vision-desc: To be the leading technology partner in the Middle East, known for excellence, innovation, and exceptional client service.
aboutSection.values-desc: Integrity, innovation, excellence, and client-centricity guide everything we do and every solution we deliver.
aboutSection.why-choose-desc: We combine expertise, dedication, and innovation to deliver solutions that exceed expectations.

why.expertise-desc: Over 10 years of experience delivering successful projects across diverse industries and sectors.
why.support-desc: Round-the-clock technical support to ensure your systems run smoothly at all times.
why.quality-desc: Rigorous testing and quality standards ensure reliable, high-performance solutions.
why.innovation-desc: We stay ahead of technology trends to bring you the most advanced solutions available.

aboutSection.branches-description: With offices across the region, we're always close to serve you better.

policy.title: Privacy Policy
policy.subtitle: At Tamiuzz, we are committed to protecting your personal information. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data.

section1.title: Information Collection
section1.content: We collect the following information when you use our website:
items: Contact information such as email and phone number.
Technical information such as IP address, browser type, pages visited, and usage duration.
Any information you voluntarily provide through forms or support inquiries.

section2.title: Use of Information
section2.content: We use the data we collect for the following purposes:
items: Improving the user experience on the website.
Responding to inquiries and providing technical support.
Sending updates or offers with your consent.
Analyzing website performance and improving our services.

section3.title: Data Protection
section3.content: We take all appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, modification, loss, or damage.

section4.title: Information Sharing
section4.content: We do not sell or share your personal data with any third party, except as required by law or with your prior consent. We use cookies to improve your experience.

section5.title: Your Rights
items: Request access to the personal data we hold about you.
Request modification or deletion of your information.
Withdraw your consent at any time.

section6.title: Modifications
section6.content: We may update the privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated last modified date.
